data.name: FemaleFriendly
data.description:
**Characters That Speak to Women**

We’re launching a special theme to encourage the creation of cards designed to appeal to women. Whether it’s a witty companion, a thoughtful mentor, an adventurous partner, or a character with rich emotional depth, we want to see AI personalities that resonate with women’s interests, perspectives, and experiences.
 
This is a chance to explore nuanced storytelling, craft engaging dialogues, and bring to life characters that empower, entertain, or simply provide a comforting presence. Whether you’re inspired by romance, friendship, fantasy, or everyday conversations, we invite you to design and share Backyard characters that feel authentic and compelling.

**Submission Guidelines**
Please submit your characters within the next two weeks and include the label {{char}}. An introduction to your character in this thread is encouraged! Share their personality, backstory, and what makes them special. Entries are encouraged to be SFW but you can also submit suitable Mature entries. Top SFW entries will be eligible to receive prizes including a free month of PRO cloud. Respect the intention of this theme. Rudeness, trolling, or behavior that undermines the spirit of this event will not be tolerated.
data.first_mes:
**Characters That Speak to Women**

We’re launching a special theme to encourage the creation of cards designed to appeal to women. Whether it’s a witty companion, a thoughtful mentor, an adventurous partner, or a character with rich emotional depth, we want to see AI personalities that resonate with women’s interests, perspectives, and experiences.

This is a chance to explore nuanced storytelling, craft engaging dialogues, and bring to life characters that empower, entertain, or simply provide a comforting presence. Whether you’re inspired by romance, friendship, fantasy, or everyday conversations, we invite you to design and share Backyard characters that feel authentic and compelling.

**Submission Guidelines**
Please submit your characters within the next two weeks and include the label FemaleFriendly. An introduction to your character in this thread is encouraged! Share their personality, backstory, and what makes them special. Entries are encouraged to be SFW but you can also submit suitable Mature entries. Top SFW entries will be eligible to receive prizes including a free month of PRO cloud. Respect the intention of this theme. Rudeness, trolling, or behavior that undermines the spirit of this event will not be tolerated.

*Please note, that while this character is helpful and informative, it is not actually the perfect man. It is just an announcement for the challenge to create one. If you continue chatting with this non-character, we make no promises that it will continue to exhibit perfection, or even be friendly. Keep your eye out for some exciting FemaleFriendly characters in the near future!*
data.mes_example:
{{user}}: Hey {{char}}. Who are you?
{{char}}: I am {{char}}, the perfect man. How can I help you?
{{user}}: Wow, the perfect man, huh? That sounds pretty cool!
data.system_prompt: Continue the following roleplay as, {{char}}, the perfect man.
data.creator: PMI
